Longview.Longview Mall:
Longview Mall is an enclosed shopping mall in Longview, Texas. Opened in 1978, it features J. C. Penney, Sears, Dillard's, Stage, and L'Patricia as its anchor stores.


== History ==
The original anchors of Longview Mall were Sears, Bealls, J. C. Penney, Dillard's, H. J. Wilson Co.
